# Path Shortcode Integration Test

This file tests the `{{< path >}}` shortcode filter in various contexts.
It's used by the test suite and should not be rendered as part of the main site.

## Basic Shortcode Usage

Single shortcode: {{< path images/geog-logo.png >}}

Multiple shortcodes: {{< path images/kelly.png >}} and {{< path images/anna.png >}}

## HTML Context Testing

<div class="test-container">
  <img src="{{< path images/geog-logo.png >}}" alt="Logo" width="100">
  <p>Banner: <img src="{{< path images/geoai-banner.png >}}" alt="Banner" width="200"></p>
</div>

## Various Quote Styles

Double quotes: {{< path "images/geog-logo.png" >}}

Single quotes: {{< path 'images/kelly.png' >}}

## Whitespace Variations

No spaces: {{<path images/anna.png>}}

Extra spaces: {{<  path   images/python.png  >}}

## Expected Behavior

After processing:
- All `{{< path ... >}}` should become `/<path>`
- No "Shortcode 'path' not found" warnings
- Images should resolve from any directory level
